original_text: If anyone sits on anything that he has sat on, they will also become unclean. So they must wash their clothes and their body. They will also be unclean until evening.
korean_text: 유출병이 있는 자가 앉았던 자리에 앉는 자는 그의 옷을 빨고 물로 씻을 것이요 저녁까지 부정하리라

sentences.original_text: So they must wash their clothes
sentences.korean_translation: 그러므로 그들은 자신의 옷을 씻어야 한다

sentences.original_text: They will also be unclean until evening
